Name: Torque Drift
About the game: Build your car, earn sponsors, and compete on the world stage in ONLINE TANDEM BATTLES to become a DRIFT KING! MULTIPLAYER DRIFTING Experience REAL drifting physics! Smoke it up in tournaments of up to 32 players, or kickback on the squad with up to 10 players in Open Lobbies! TUNE YOUR RIDE TO PERFECTION Get your hands DIRTY! Tune your camber, toe and suspension to SLAM your ride. Handle corners, tackle each of the challenges, and DOMINATE the track! BURN UP THE TRACKS Battle in online multiplayer tandem drifting on over 15 exhilarating REAL world tracks! REAL LICENSED PARTS AND CARS Battle REAL professional drifting teams, collect sponsors, and deck your ride out with custom livery painting and REAL licensed parts including FEAL Suspension, Kinugawa Turbo, Nitrous Express, Mishimoto and more! GET TO THE TOP Climb the Leaderboards and challenge for LEGEND status against other DRIFT KINGS. Win challenges, earn rewards and Twitch streaming prizes, and FLEX your titles!
